wikipedia_page.main: Jake David Charles (born 16 February 1996) is a professional footballer who plays as a striker or winger for Stafford Rangers.

response: Charles was married twice during his life. In 1953, he married Margaret "Peggy" White; the couple had four sons together. They divorced in 1982. In 1988, Charles married Glenda Vero, who he remained married to until his death in 2004. The Charles name continued in football through nephew Jeremy Charles, who also represented Wales, and grandson Jake Charles, who has represented Wales at youth level.
